mapper.insert: insert into sss_order (order_Id, car_Id, cu_Id, post_PName, post_PTel, post_PAddr, get_PName, get_PTel, get_PAddr, goods_Name, good_Weight, order_Type, order_State, transport_Price, delivery_Price, total_Price, comment) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postPaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getPaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sss_order set car_Id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_Id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_PName = #{postPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_PTel = #{postPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_PAddr = #{postPaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_PName = #{getPname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_PTel = #{getPtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, get_PAddr = #{getPaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_Name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_Weight = #{goodWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_Type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_State = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transport_Price = #{transportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delivery_Price = #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_Price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_Id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_Id, car_Id, cu_Id, post_PName, post_PTel, post_PAddr, get_PName, get_PTel, get_PAddr, goods_Name, good_Weight, order_Type, order_State, transport_Price, delivery_Price, total_Price, comment from sss_order where order_Id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
